name: AgentManager
description: A tool for managing AI agents and switching between them. Supports switching agents, listing available agents, getting current agent info, and getting information about specific agents.

action.description: The action to perform: switch to a different agent, list available agents, get current agent info, or get info about a specific agent

agent_id.description: The ID of the agent to switch to or get info about (required for switch and info actions)

user_id.description: The user ID for user-specific actions like switching agents or getting current agent (required for switch and current actions)

channel_id.description: The channel ID for channel-specific actions like switching agents or getting current agent (required for switch and current actions)
